subject: Women's World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Marie Hammarstrom scored in the 82nd minute, giving short-handed Sweden a 2-1 victory over France in the third-place game at the Women’s World Cup in Sinsheim, Germany.
snippet: Marie Hammarstrom scored in the 82nd minute, giving short-handed Sweden a 2-1 victory over France in the third-place game at the Women’s World Cup in Sinsheim, Germany.
